name: Lifts & Slopes
text: 41.6 km of pistes the Grossglockner Resort is the largest ski resort in East Tyrol. You can expect fun on the slopes at the highest level. 100% of the area is covered with snow and snow-covered three descents guarantee snow until spring. Generous beginner areas both in Kals and in Matrei promise wonderful conditions for experts and beginners.
